title: Community services | RRHC
cleaned_text: top of page Beneficial services offered to our community - On-site laboratory services - Free vaccines for children - Electronic health records - Dedicated referral coordinator - Well child exams - Preventive/restorative dental with digital radiography - Mental health counseling - Acupuncture - Free nutrition education - Low-cost prescriptions 340B program - Bilingual spanish-speaking staff - Program and health insurance application assistance bottom of page
